effectsDescription:
Invoke: Set the remaining

health of all units to 1.

At the end of your turn restore 1

health to all your units.
title: Equality

effectsDescription:
Invoke: Summon a 1/1 Employee

Whenever you summon a unit,

give it +1/+0
title: Family Restaurant

effectsDescription:
Invoke: Restore 6 health to your hero.

Whenever a friendly unit is Overhealed, buff its health equal to the excess.
title: Idol Dream

effectsDescription:
Invoke: Add two 1/2 Weather Spirits

to your hand.

Whenever you summon a unit, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
title: Rainy Day

effectsDescription:
Invoke: Add two Horror to your hand.

Whenever you Play a unit, give it a random Mutation.
title: Soul Food

effectsDescription:
Invoke: Summon two Ruffians with Rush.

Whenever a friendly unit attacks, give your hero +1/+0 this turn.
title: Synchronicity
